Name: This rain will never end - noir adventure detective
About the game: First, the Mayor of the city hanged himself. Then the endless rain started. And now someone knocking on my door. Who could it be? You are in a noir adventure game where you will play a cat detective who needs to investigate the suicide of the Mayor of Sunny city. Suddenly the rain started to drop endlessly and no one knows why. So you are in the game now and will have to find a killer by: Combining pieces of evidence Resolving puzzles Talking to people Resolving detective mystery Hope you'll like the adventure. Step in!
